Name: Hannibal's Hermits
Details: Founded in the early thirtieth century by the Aufkophen family.  After negative experiences with the Draconis Combine, the Lyran Commonwealth and finally the Free Worlds League, the Hermits have now found a home with the Word of Blake.  The Hermits have a close relationship with the Word, and are considered the Word's flagship mercenary unit.  Hannibal's Hermits consist of three battalions of Battlemechs and two battalions of mechanized infantry.
